qualifiedSingularNounPhrase(anyPlural)grammar

en_us.t[5772]

Summary

Summary

Details

Details

A singular qualified noun phrase that arbitrarily selects from a plural set. This is singular, even though the underlying noun phrase is plural, because we're explicitly selecting one item. `grammar `[`qualifiedSingularNounPhrase`](../object/qualifiedSingularNounPhrase.html)`(anyPlural)`` :   `[`ArbitraryNounProd`](../object/ArbitraryNounProd.html)
